h2_title: Where to use The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice can be used in conjunction with The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision, The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion, and The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave in The New West at the prisoner in the first cell at the base of the Pagoda Realm. With all of these items, you can return to the prisoner to obtain the Chubai Spearhead").
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice can be used in conjunction with The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision, The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion, and The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave in The New West at the prisoner in the first cell at the base of the Pagoda Realm. With all of these items, you can return to the prisoner to obtain the Chubai Spearhead").
